Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great place on which you will not suddenly bump. 4 course menu, every dish is surprise and value for money. Very good taste and excellent choice of wines (which also could come as special recommendation for every course)

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We went to restaurant Adam to celebrate my wife’s birthday. It’s a small restaurant that was totally not on our list yet. But now it is. We loved the food! We had the 5 course menu. The vegetarian creations are beautiful and tasty. I let …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: It is a very cosy place with a nice ambience. We went for a five-course surprise menu. All the dishes were absolutely delicious with very well-balanced ingredients and flavours. A very good and wide range of wines. The service was really friendly and professional. Totally recomended!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great restaurant, had dinner here last night. The service is attentive and knowledgeable and the food close to michelin starred. Great combinations and unexpected flavours. It’s a changing menu, so no a la carte options. The winelist is …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Had the most lovely experience at Adam, a restaurant I had been eyeing up for some time, and didn't disappoint! …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Excellent 3 course chef's menu consisting of well presented and very tasty dishes. The main and dessert were particularly good! Front of house were friendly, relaxed and attentive when necessary. The only bum note was the wines by the glass - the Austrian red was one to avoid. Overall though, a thoroughly enjoyable dinner

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Most likely the best restaurant we've ever been to! We went for the tasting menu, accompanied with the wine paring. Every single course was something amazing and new. The service was amazing and considerate. We never felt rushed, and we …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Absolutely the best place in Amsterdam. Great vegetarian and seafood as well. Fantastic cuisine.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Delicious food without any pretentiousness! Would highly recommend the 6-course menu with the wine pairings

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Totally wonderful experience - lovely food, I went with the vegetarian surprise menu and wine pairing. Delicious food, lovely space and outstanding service.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
Everything dish served was great! great value for money! great people and
chef! Thank you for unforgettable dinner!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Cozy restaurant with amazing food in terms of taste & presentation. They have 3-6 course surprise menus and created an all vegan menu for me. The staff is very cool as well! I really enjoyed the dinner.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
We had an amazing diner here. Everything is great, waiter is amazing, food is amazing, do not hesitate !
Can be a little expensive but hey, great food comes at a price !
Expect to see us again next time we visit this lovely city :)

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We were amazed of the quality and creativity of each course. The wines for each course were selected absolutely perfect. Service was terrific and adding the music selection made this an evening we will always remember.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We had dinner here a few weeks ago and we’re still talking about how nice it was. I’m vegan and they created very special tasteful dishes for me. The wines were delicious and the staff was so friendly and fast. We will be back! And best of luck in these difficult times. Hope you can reopen soon!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Somewhat over the top " cuisine Nouveau" restaurant. Great selection of wines you can drink by the glad  Only three things on the menu. Four courses 40 euro, five courses fifty euro. Six courses sixty euro. For those not used to this food …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
A rising star. Had a very good dinner of 4 courses with wine arrangement. The 4 dishes were great...and the wines were even better.
Service was very kind and friendly. Would definitely go back to see the progress of their menu!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: I want to mention that 3 star rating is based on personal preference and nothing that the restaurant did. I would suggest this location which is looking for a long dinner with creative dishes. …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Amazing dinner at Adam. Accommodates vegan and vegetarians ❤️

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Excellent restaurant with excellent service! Food experience like no other with reasonable prices for what you get. The staff and owner very willing to accommodate their guests and they definitely elevate the culinary experience. Thank you guys for this experience and maybe see you next year!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: My girlfriend and I had dinner here, going both for a 4 course menu. The food was simply delicious, the concept of the dishes and the plating done with attention and care, and above all what I think is the owner was friendly and always …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
Good food, nice staff and cool atmosphere.
The menu was really nice, the food was super fresh and well prepared. totally worth it the visit. Staff was friendly and the atmosphere is also very cool... great location as well.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We had a 4 course surprise menu with wine pairing. As we understood,  these were local specialities in a modern way of cooking and setting. The food was great,  the wine pairing impeccable. The service was friendly and attentive. It is definitely worth visiting.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We had a six course dinner with wine pairing and enjoyed every bit of it. Really good quality food and relaxed but highly professional service. We live around the corner, so will be back soon!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: gorgeous gorgeous gorgeous 10/10

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Not quite ready for a Michelin star, but very close. The chef prepared delicious food from fresh ingredients and the staff took pride in everything they served. Some repetition of ingredients across dishes, but overall a well-cooked “surprise menu”.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: If you want to have a special dinning experience try Restaurant Adam. You have the option to choose a dinner of one to 6 cources. along the way they serve some delicious "extras" to go with your meal. This is truly a culinary experience to …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We had fixed dinner menu. The service was excellent. They made adjustments to tge food according to our requests. We liked most of the food. They could have invested more in interior design to have better atmosphere. Good experience on the whole.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: It was almost a 5 star experience. Very nice and modern setting. You can order a la carte or pick between different courses. We've picked a 4 course menu which was fish, fish, meat, dessert. Before you start going there will be some small …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: We were totally delighted with Adam which we had read about on Trip Advisor.  We opted to sit in the kitchen viewing area where we could see the care with which each dish was prepared/presented.  And, it was much quieter than inside the …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
Lovely place!
We plan to visit for long and this was the first but surely not last...
We ask for a 5 course "Chef choice" menu and we enjoyed every bit! …

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Really good value for money. Delicious food. Fantastic host.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: One of the most incredible eating experiences ever! The menu is not ala carte and the kind of food you get is a surprise (all delicious). You can choose meat or veg. You have the choice of how many courses to order. Don't mis this experience if you're in Amsterdam.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Nice restaurant not in the touristy area. There are. It does not have many seats so on weekends make sure you make a reservation. The Tasting menu is a pleasant way of getting a great impression of the chefs thoughts.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: I took the fish of the day, which was amazing. The staff is friendly and very polite. The prices are a little higher than your normal restaurant, but definitely aligned with the quality of the food they serve. Highly recommend!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Stunning meal at Adam last week. sensational tasting menu with exquisite pairing with really interesting, thoughtful wines. a far cry from recent wine pairing experiences. will definitely be going again. 5*

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Wonderful meal in this cozy little place. The vegetarian option was first class, and wine pairing amazing!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
Awesome experience. Local products carefully chosen and creatively combined resulting in deliciousness.
Super nice hosts providing and assessing all the time.
Congratulations

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Lovely food, excellent service. We had the 5 courses. It was a bit too much food for us but we loved every course.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Extremely friendly and helpful staff. The surprise menu was great. Good selection of wines. Would definitely come again

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: If you need good food, with decent pricing, in a nice spacious setting, this is your place. Great staff!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Lovely second visit with friendly unfussy timely service. Doesn't say it loudly but actually gives one of the best vegetarian tasting menu experiences around (and I'm not veggie!).

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Food quality and service were both solid, however, the menu was VERY narrow/limited.  Dishes were a bit odd, and some did not quite work. The portions were small.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Owner seemed a little crazy, but in a good way! Likeways the food was good, don't let him order the wine ;)

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Exceptional food! An absolute treat to eat at this restaurant. Love the surprise menu, and the approach to fresh and local ingredients.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Excellent excellent food!!!! Staff amazing. Every course was devine apart from the dessert which could have been a bit more special.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Super Good Restaurant, excellent staff,food,prices,amazing combos,cuissons were on spot,recommend highly

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Paul and Sabrina are good people. The food is fantastic and the decor is amazing.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Why this place hasn't received a Michelin star yet is beyond me. Our favourite restaurant in Amsterdam by far! Service and food impeccable!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Very good! Surprise menu was amazing, staff is super friendly - would totally recommend!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Very good kitchen for a reasonable price, attentive service and a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Dinnertime at its best.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text:
Great restaurant, awesome food and lovely service.
Get the surprise menu and you will not be disappointed

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great little gem of a restaurant. Lovely food and nice service. It doesn't look very flash at all from inside but definitely worth trying

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great informal service. Nice wine pairing and good food

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great service, and very imaginative dishes, full of flavour

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Wonderful fine dining restaurant that has a "secret" menu. Great meal.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Good food and service, but the food was a little boring for a luxury restaurant. Well worth it because of the view and atmosphere.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Tasty, good price, tasty, great surprise menu, tasty and cozy atmosphere. Oh, did I mention it's tasty?

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Very good food. Lovely staff. Great experience!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great restaurant! And the vegetarian food is amazing! Fiiiiiiiive stars.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Cool but not amazing food for the price; cozy atmosphere

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Sooooooooo good.  Food 5 star Service 5 star.  Best bisque in town - full stop.

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, great food, tremendous dining experience

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great food, service, vibe! Will go back :)

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: Great restaurant in my neighboorhood!

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: One of de best restaurant in Amsterdan....

Name: Adam Restaurant
Review Text: By far one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam!
